text:
After installation of apache tomcat 6.0.33 version.sh and startup.sh looks for ../7.0.21/bin/setclasspath.sh script:


> ./apache-tomcat-6.0.33/bin/startup.sh 
Cannot find /apache-tomcat-7.0.21/bin/setclasspath.sh
This file is needed to run this program


Couldn't find any script in which is it defined so couldn't workaround it.
creator: Yossi.Shmulevitch@gmail.com
knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
The script looks for "$CATALINA_HOME"/bin/setclasspath.sh
You have wrong value of $CATALINA_HOME environment variable.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This is a user error, not a bug. Further assistance is available from the Tomcat users mailing list.
